definitions: an alteration or correction made to achieve a desired fit, appearance, or result

examples.text: the commercial property market has certainly experienced a significant readjustment

shortDefinitions: alteration or correction made to achieve desired fit or result

definitions: the process of adapting or becoming used to a changed situation

examples.text: was there a period of readjustment you had to go through when you went back to work?

shortDefinitions: process of adapting or becoming used to changed situation
